get order flowers now for esther's visitation graveside service. jun 24. 10:00 am parkhill cemetery. columbus, ga, us, 31907. get order flowers now for esther's graveside service cemetery details. parkhill cemetery. columbus, ga, us, 31907. get show less view & service share facebook twitter google+ post now light a candle virtual gifts yellow rose periwinkle blue green red dove angel heart hug butterfly roses hands in prayer bible sunshine teddy american flag veteran rosary gardener interlocked rings catholic cross football baseball golf sailboat firefighter non catholic cross basketball police buddha hockey coach soccer star of david canadian flag menorah memories events media share a memory of esther peard bedgood duffell send comfort to the duffell family when it's needed most. to show you care same-day hand delivery by a local florist! gw glenn and nan williams. jun 21 at 3:04 pm there is little one can say at a time like this. but, we want you to know that we are thinking of you and that you have our heartfelt sympathy. aunt pearl was a very special person to us. we are so grateful we were able to have a lovely visit with her at magnolia manor. even then, she had a wonderful outlook and a great sense of humor. she will be missed. love, glenn and nan williams. comment share comment share facebook twitter
